pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 4, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, April 4, 2016:

Ottawa

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Canadian Cancer Society Daffodil presentation.

Canada Reception Centre
Hangar 11
190 Convair Private
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
